hideAreaUnderButton: Book guides or bikes
textContent: Book bikes or tour guides for the trails (by bike or by hiking) to find out more about the area and the mining industry. Hear the story of Rosia Montana by having a chat at a glass of 'Palinca' with the locals in the gazebo from Casa Petri yard.
moreDetailsText: The bookings for bikes and tours are made from the accommodation page when you book a room. See here...
